responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "D1097A854D6C31D0D84F1EAF809F2C75", "The spirits whisper of the Horn's burden, a shadow on its song. Zinjala's twist must be undone, but the way is not simple. Journey to a sacred place, where the earth holds ancient, rare things. The path is hidden and the spirits will test you. Only by finding the broken places and gathering what has been lost can the curse be lifted.")
name: DD_0114_EotGH_Tkano_3_Response
